comment: Lectures are useless but the powerpoints she provides help understand material. HW won't be graded each week unless each lab for the week is complete. HW makes  up a majority of the grade and will help boost you up. She is willing to provide extra credit for tests especially if she knows the students are struggling. Not a bad professor at all.
rating_tags: CARES ABOUT STUDENTS--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: As long as you know the basics about C++ you would be fine. Her homework was not too difficult, just time consuming. Her labs were also just to test our understanding after the lecture. It was a way of knowing what you learned and what you needed to learn.

Assignments were not clear a lot of times. No one paid any attention to her in the lectures since she used other people's materials. Tough grader on tests, while reasonable grading on the assignments.
easy class, she is not a tough grader either.
